Package com.payd.shooti.localstore

Class LocalStore

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.localstore.LocalStore
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerAppearanceStore, PlayerInventoryStore, PlayerLevelsStore, PlayerLoadoutStore, PlayerPerksStore, PlayerSpraysStore, SettingsStore, WeaponCharmsStore, WeaponConfigStore, WeaponLevelsStore
public abstract class LocalStore extends Object
Abstract class for storing and retrieving data from the local preferences file. Automatic loading and saving. Define store keys in allKeys(). Use key(String, Object) to define a key and default value.

Since LocalStore uses Preferences, it can only support the 4 fundamental types:
  • String
  • Integer
  • Float
  • Boolean
See Also:
  • LocalStore.StoreKey
  • allKeys()
  • key(String, Object)

    • LocalStore

  • Method Details

    • load

      public void load()
      Loads all values from the preferences file into the local cache. Implements the allKeys() abstract function to determine which keys to load and with which default values.

    • saveAll

      public void saveAll()
      Saves all values from the local cache to the preferences file.

    • set

      public <T> void set(String key, T value)
      Updates the local cache with the given key and value.

    • get

      public <T> T get(String key)
      Returns the value of the given key from the local cache.

    • get

      public <T> T get(String key, T defaultValue)
      Returns the value of the given key from the local cache, or the defaultValue if the key does not exist. Updates the preferences file with the default value in that case as well.

    • allKeys

      protected abstract LocalStore.StoreKey[] allKeys()
      Should return an array of LocalStore.StoreKey instances with the key and default value for each key. Used for centralized save and load.

    • key

      protected final LocalStore.StoreKey key(String key, Object defaultValue)
      Helper function to return a LocalStore.StoreKey key:value pair for use in the initialization of a LocalStore, where the value is the default value applied if a reference does not exist in the preferences file.

    • flushToSystem

      public void flushToSystem()

    • getGetterConverter

      private Consumer<LocalStore.LocalStoreMetadataWrapper> getGetterConverter(Object obj)

    • getSetterConverter

      private Consumer<LocalStore.LocalStoreMetadataWrapper> getSetterConverter(Object obj)

    • initializeConverters

      private void initializeConverters()
      Populates the converter maps for set & get type-based operations with the Preferences API.

    • canLog

      private boolean canLog()
